title: Mueller Report Controversy, The Fight for Trump's Tax Returns & Tim Ryan's 2020 Bid | Bernie Sanders
itunes:title: Mueller Report Controversy, The Fight for Trump's Tax Returns & Tim Ryan's 2020 Bid | Bernie Sanders
description:
Controversy swirls around William Barr's Mueller report summary, Democrats call for President Trump's tax returns, and Sen. Bernie Sanders discusses his 2020 White House bid.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
